feed.title: Brackets Extensions Weekly
feed.subtitle: New and updated stuff to improve your Brackets experience

entry.title: Weekly Brackets Extension Update - 15/14
entry.content:
Welcome to This Week’s Brackets Extension Updates, Issue 15/14.

Added or updated @Brackets extensions in the week from 03/22/2015 to 03/29/2015.

Last week there were 3 new Extensions and 10 updates. This includes themes and other extensions.

What’s going on?

I’m a bit late this time. Too much things going on at the same time. :-)
I’m still catching up with the previous weeks.

Have a great week!

In the meantime, you can find us on these social networks

  • Facebook
  • Google Plus
  • twitter

Share your thoughts and stories, ask questions and get in touch with the team.

As usual, you can download the latest Brackets release. Please let us know what you think.

Top 11 Extension Downloads of last week

Find an overview of extensions that moved up and down the list.

Rank # Name Downloads Previous Week
1 Brackets Git 4673 #8 ⇑
2 Emmet 4240 #3 ⇑
3 Beautify 4083 #2 ⇓
4 Code Folding 3618 #1 ⇓
5 Brackets Icons 2540 #4 ⇓
6 PHP SmartHints 1722 ⇔
7 Minimap 1717 #9 ⇑
8 JSHint 1633 #5 ⇓
9 Extensions Rating 1519 #7 ⇓
10 Brackets Additional Right Click Menu) 1461 ☼
11 LESS AutoCompile 1434 ☼

Top 11 Theme Downloads of last week

Find an overview of themes that moved up and down the list.

Rank # Name Downloads Previous Week
1 Monokai Dark Soda 2593 #2 ⇑
2 Resonant Light 940 #3 ⇑
3 Darkium Theme 753 ☼
4 Dark Cloud 748 #1 ⇓
5 Obsidian 2.0 700 ☼
6 Monokai 562 ⇔
7 Neon 546 #10 ⇑
8 Flatlandish 512 #7 ⇓
9 Mystique 507 #8 ⇓
10 JetBrains Darcula 502 #4 ⇓
11 Blue Dream 486 #5 ⇓

New Extensions

Name Version Description Download
Brackets Zip 0.1.0 Support for Zip archives.
DarkSystemCD | Theme 1.0.0 provide the productivity quality production from DarkSystemCD programming as WDS_Styles color scheme.
Pascal Syntax Highlighting 1.0.0 Pascal Syntax for the Brackets editor.

Updated Extensions

Name Version Description Download
LESS AutoCompile 1.1.8 Automatically compiles less files upon saving.
Legibility 0.0.3 Increase the legibility of Brackets’ UI. Useful for High DPI screens
Brackets Color Palette 2.0.1 Pick colors directly from images (.png, .jpg, .jpeg, .gif, *.ico)
SFtpUpload 1.3.3 Upload changed files in your project to a server via SFTP(SCP)/FTP, you have total control over which to upload through the changed files panel. Contributors: danielkratz, mhentgesarrow, dedo1911, swengmatt
Zotero Integration 0.1.6 Add In-Text Citations and Manage Bibliographies in Scholarly Markdown using Zotero
Git Projects 0.0.5 Git Projects is a package which allows you to quickly list and open your local git repositories.
PHPLinter for Brackets 1.0.2 This extension works using php -l command
Obsidian 2.0 1.1.2 Theme based on Obsidian for Seam and change highlight colours
Project Templates 1.0.3 Adds template-based project generation to Brackets
DCBlocks 0.0.4 Adds support for easily creating of comments for DOM elements in HTML/XML code to Brackets
entry.summary:
Welcome to This Week’s Brackets Extension Updates, Issue 15/14.

Added or updated

entry.title: Weekly Brackets Extension Update - 15/13
entry.content:
Welcome to This Week’s Brackets Extension Updates, Issue 15/13.

Added or updated @Brackets extensions in the week from 03/15/2015 to 03/22/2015.

Last week there were 2 new Extensions and 7 updates. This includes themes and other extensions.

What’s going on?

I’m a bit late this time. Too much things going on at the same time. :-)
I’m still catching up with the previous weeks.

Have a great week!

In the meantime, you can find us on these social networks

  • Facebook
  • Google Plus
  • twitter

Share your thoughts and stories, ask questions and get in touch with the team.

As usual, you can download the latest Brackets release. Please let us know what you think.

Top 11 Extension Downloads of last week

Find an overview of extensions that moved up and down the list.

Rank # Name Downloads Previous Week
1 Code Folding 4697 ⇔
2 Beautify 4487 ⇔
3 Emmet 4434 ⇔
4 Brackets Icons 4302 ☼
5 JSHint 3925 ⇔
6 PHP SmartHints 2823 #4 ⇓
7 Extensions Rating 2289 ☼
8 Brackets Git 1923 #9 ⇑
9 Minimap 1674 #7 ⇓
10 Indent Guides 1636 #11 ⇑
11 Brackets Snippets (by edc) 1630 #6 ⇓

Top 11 Theme Downloads of last week

Find an overview of themes that moved up and down the list.

Rank # Name Downloads Previous Week
1 Dark Cloud 1364 #2 ⇑
2 Monokai Dark Soda 1084 #4 ⇑
3 Resonant Light 994 ☼
4 JetBrains Darcula 805 #5 ⇑
5 Blue Dream 730 ☼
6 Monokai 679 #9 ⇑
7 Flatlandish 671 #1 ⇓
8 Mystique 667 #3 ⇓
9 Simple Theme 655 ☼
10 Neon 634 #7 ⇓
11 Stripper 440 ⇔

New Extensions

Name Version Description Download
Darkium Theme 1.1.0 Un tema para Brackets oscuro identifica de forma sencilla la funcion de cada etiqueta
Scroll Arrows 0.1.0 Adds scroll arrows to Brackets’ scrollbars. Windows only for now.

Updated Extensions

Name Version Description Download
Puppet-Syntax 0.1.6 Syntax highlighting for Puppet manifests.
Lorem Pixel 0.1.5 Generate placeholder Images for every case
Brackets-Gulp 0.3.1 Adds Gulp.js support to Brackets.
Overscroll 1.0.1 Allow the user to scroll below the document.
Postman 0.1.1 REST Client that simplifies creation and sending of HTTP requests. This is an alpha release. Please report your ideas and bugs.
Shizimily Multi-Encoding for Brackets 0.0.8 Read and write the non UTF-8 encoding (Shift_JIS, GB18030, EUC-KR, European, UTF-16, etc) file by Brackets. (Decode and encode by iconv-lite)
Resonant Light 0.1.2 Light theme, with dark UI elements. Uses SourceSansPro for comments. Font smoothing is set to sub-pixel for better rendering on Mac OSX. 0.1.2 - Added Documents Toolbar Styles

Welcome to This Week’s Brackets Extension Updates, Issue 15/13.

Added or updated

entry.title: Weekly Brackets Extension Update - 15/12
entry.content:
Welcome to This Week’s Brackets Extension Updates, Issue 15/12.

Added or updated @Brackets extensions in the week from 03/08/2015 to 03/15/2015.

Last week there were 8 new Extensions and 13 updates. This includes themes and other extensions.

What’s going on?

I’m a bit late this time. Too much things going on at the same time. :-)
I’m still catching up with the previous weeks.

Have a great week!

In the meantime, you can find us on these social networks

  • Facebook
  • Google Plus
  • twitter

Share your thoughts and stories, ask questions and get in touch with the team.

As usual, you can download the latest Brackets release. Please let us know what you think.

Top 11 Extension Downloads of last week

Find an overview of extensions that moved up and down the list.

Rank # Name Downloads Previous Week
1 Code Folding 6088 #4 ⇑
2 Beautify 4516 ⇔
3 Emmet 4276 ⇔
4 PHP SmartHints 3963 ☼
5 JSHint 3734 ☼
6 Brackets Snippets (by edc) 3092 #10 ⇑
7 Minimap 2880 ☼
8 Brackets SASS 2033 ☼
9 Brackets Git 2003 #1 ⇓
10 More HTML5 Code Hints 1868 #11 ⇑
11 Indent Guides 1759 #5 ⇓

Top 11 Theme Downloads of last week

Find an overview of themes that moved up and down the list.

Rank # Name Downloads Previous Week
1 Flatlandish 1226 #4 ⇑
2 Dark Cloud 1138 ☼
3 Mystique 1137 ☼
4 Monokai Dark Soda 1120 #2 ⇓
5 JetBrains Darcula 1092 ☼
6 Tomorrow Night Eighties 757 #8 ⇑
7 Neon 744 #3 ⇓
8 Orchid Theme 731 ☼
9 Monokai 697 #5 ⇓
10 Spacegray-Brackets 543 ☼
11 Stripper 465 #1 ⇓

New Extensions

Name Version Description Download
Brackets SASS 2.0.1-109 IMPORTANT Read “More info…” if you have issues removing or installing. Compiles SASS .sass/.scss files when changed. Updates styles during Live Preview. Experimental support for Quick Edit.
JetBrains Darcula 1.0.0 Dark theme based on JetBrains WebStorm’s Darcula
Gherkin Syntax Highlighting for Brackets 0.1.0 Provides Gherkin syntax highlighting.
Brackets Darker 3.2.0 Darker interface & editor themes
Dark Cloud 1.0.0 Dark and smooth, rest your eyes.
Blue Dream 1.0.0 Why does everyone can dream. Por que todo mundo pode sonhar.
Shortcut for moving between splitted windows 1.0.0 Switch active pane on Alt-W (or your own shortcut).
JSLint error explanations 0.1.1 This extension helps you to understand the sometimes cryptic error messages produced by JSLint, JSHint and ESLint, using data from jslinterrors.com.

Updated Extensions

Name Version Description Download
SVG Preview 1.3.0 Live preview SVG files in an inline panel while you edit them. Click in SVG to jump to corresponding code.
JSHint 2.2.11 Adds JSHint support to Brackets.
Console 1.4.1 Shows console.log & console.error & console.warn without developer tools.
JSCompiler2 2.0.0 Compress your JavaScript code from multiple files into one minified file (Powered by UglifyJS2).
Mystique 0.1.8 A soft, dark theme that makes code look good.
LiveScript Syntax Highlighting for Brackets 0.1.0 Provides LiveScript syntax highlighting.
ViewCalc 0.1.1 Viewport (vh/vw) calculator
Simple To-Do 0.1.5 Simple to-do list for Brackets. Tasks can be stored in text files or Trello.
cuwire: IDE for microcontrollers 0.5.3 Now Brackets can be used to develop software for MCUs. Throw away you Arduino, Energia and others.
Flatlandish 0.7.2 Theme based roughly off of the Sublime Text Flatland Theme
Tomorrow Night Eighties 1.1.2 Tomorrow Night Eighties theme for Brackets
Orchid Theme 1.0.3 Orchid theme for Brackets
Zoom wheel 0.1.1 Increase / Decrease Font Size with the Mouse Wheel
entry.summary:
Welcome to This Week’s Brackets Extension Updates, Issue 15/12.

Added or updated

entry.title: Weekly Brackets Extension Update - 15/11
entry.content:
Welcome to This Week’s Brackets Extension Updates, Issue 15/11.

Added or updated @Brackets extensions in the week from 03/01/2015 to 03/08/2015.

Last week there were 6 new Extensions and 14 updates. This includes themes and other extensions.

What’s going on?

I’m a bit late this time. Too much things going on at the same time. :-)
I’m still catching up with the previous weeks.

Have a great week!

In the meantime, you can find us on these social networks

  • Facebook
  • Google Plus
  • twitter

Share your thoughts and stories, ask questions and get in touch with the team.

As usual, you can download the latest Brackets release. Please let us know what you think.

Top 11 Extension Downloads of last week

Find an overview of extensions that moved up and down the list.

Rank # Name Downloads Previous Week
1 Brackets Git 5351 ⇔
2 Beautify 4867 ⇔
3 Emmet 4473 ⇔
4 Code Folding 4318 ⇔
5 Indent Guides 4116 ☼
6 Documents Toolbar 3486 #8 ⇑
7 Minimap 2979 #5 ⇓
8 Extensions Rating 2777 #10 ⇑
9 HTML Templates 1946 #7 ⇓
10 Brackets Snippets (by edc) 1836 ☼
11 More HTML5 Code Hints 1744 ☼

Top 11 Theme Downloads of last week

Find an overview of themes that moved up and down the list.

Rank # Name Downloads Previous Week
1 Stripper 1843 ⇔
2 Monokai Dark Soda 1505 ⇔
3 Neon 1459 ☼
4 Flatlandish 1213 ☼
5 Monokai 821 #4 ⇓
6 Dracula 819 #9 ⇑
7 Visual Studio Dark 682 #5 ⇓
8 Tomorrow Night Eighties 578 ☼
9 Obsidian 2.0 518 #3 ⇓
10 xcode theme (yosemite) Light 488 #7 ⇓
11 Sob Theme 485 ☼

New Extensions

Name Version Description Download
Sob Theme 0.8.0 Theme based on ITG.flat sublime theme + MidnightPumpkin colors.
Neon Minimap 1.0.0 Neon minimap extension for Brackets.
Sencha 0.1.0 Extension to integrate Sencha products into Brackets.
Spacegray-Brackets 1.0.0 The popular Spacegray theme from Sublime Text, now in Brackets!
Octave/MATLAB Syntax Highlighting 1.0.0 Adds syntax highlighting for Octave/MATLAB .m files
Dockerfile Syntax Highlighter 1.0.0 Syntax highlighting support for Dockerfiles

Updated Extensions

Name Version Description Download
Code Folding 0.3.2 Brackets extension that provides simple code folding for files edited in brackets. Supports brace folding, tag folding, indent folding and multi-line comment folding
JSLint Configurator 1.1.9 Enables configuration of JSLint options. Extract JSLint options to JSON.
Robot framework mode 1.1.4 Editing mode for Robotframework pipe-delimited plain text files, providing syntax highlighting, code folding, auto-completion (requires robotframework-hub - https://github.com/boakley/robotframework-hub) and more.
More HTML5 Code Hints 1.2.1 Extends HTML code hints with more HTML5 elements and attributes such as picture, srcset, inputmode as well as HTML4 elements such as cellpadding, cellspacing and iframe
More CSS Code Hints 1.2.0 Extends CSS code hints with more attributes; image-rendering, touch-action, will-change, tab-size, clip-path, user-select and more
Lorem Pixel 0.1.4 Generate placeholder Images for every case
Documents Toolbar 0.5.14 Adds toolbar with tabs of open documents on the top of the editor. Now with split view support!
JSHint Configurator 1.1.4 Enables configuration of JSHint options. Reads from current document’s inline configuration directive or from ‘.jshintrc’ configuration file. Extract JSHint options to JSON format.
JavaScript & CSS CDN Suggestions 2.0.3 Provides JavaScript and CSS suggestions/hints for libraries hosted on CDNs by Google, CDNJS and jsDelivr.
Neon 1.1.5 Neon theme for Brackets. Themed Code Folding and CSS Color Preview.
Phaser Chains 1.0.3 A great new way to search the Phaser Documentation (Open View > Phaser Chains)
Show Recently Used Items 0.5.1 Add a menu at the top of the editor with a list of all the files shown recently
Git Projects 0.0.3 Git Projects is a package which allows you to quickly list and open your local git repositories.
Shizimily Multi-Encoding for Brackets 0.0.7 Read and write the non UTF-8 encoding (Shift_JIS, GB18030, EUC-KR, European, UTF-16, etc) file by Brackets. (Decode and encode by iconv-lite)
entry.summary:
Welcome to This Week’s Brackets Extension Updates, Issue 15/11.

Added or updated

entry.title: Weekly Brackets Extension Update - 15/10
entry.content:
Welcome to This Week’s Brackets Extension Updates, Issue 15/10.

Added or updated @Brackets extensions in the week from 02/23/2015 to 03/01/2015.

Last week there were 7 new Extensions and 15 updates. This includes themes and other extensions.

What’s going on?

I’m a bit late this time. Too much things going on at the same time. :-)
We are in the final stages before the Brackets 1.3 release. Some final touches and some polish before we can call it ready. So plase stay tuned and get slowly into excitement about the new release. As usual, we’d like to hear your feedback.

Have a great week!

In the meantime, you can find us on these social networks

  • Facebook
  • Google Plus
  • twitter

Share your thoughts and stories, ask questions and get in touch with the team.

As usual, you can download the latest Brackets release. Please let us know what you think.

Top 11 Extension Downloads of last week

Find an overview of extensions that moved up and down the list.

Rank # Name Downloads Previous Week
1 Brackets Git 5606 ⇔
2 Beautify 4743 #3 ⇑
3 Emmet 4399 #4 ⇑
4 Code Folding 3987 #2 ⇓
5 Minimap 3680 #10 ⇑
6 Tabs - Custom Working 2782 ☼
7 HTML Templates 2717 #5 ⇓
8 Documents Toolbar 2656 #6 ⇓
9 FuncDocr 1983 ☼
10 Extensions Rating 1924 #11 ⇓
11 Brackets Outline List 1629 #8 ⇓

Top 11 Theme Downloads of last week

Find an overview of themes that moved up and down the list.

Rank # Name Downloads Previous Week
1 Stripper 2302 #2 ⇑
2 Monokai Dark Soda 1595 #1 ⇓
3 Obsidian 2.0 804 ☼
4 Monokai 792 #6 ⇑
5 Visual Studio Dark 732 #4 ⇓
6 Pixelarium Dark Theme 710 ☼
7 xcode theme (yosemite) Light 536 #5 ⇓
8 Blumberry Theme 514 #3 ⇓
9 Dracula 461 ☼
10 Brackets Nodejs Theme 371 #7 ⇓
11 Blackboard 294 #9 ⇓

New Extensions

Name Version Description Download
Fira in Brackets 1.0.0 A simple extension that changes the Brackets UI fonts to Fira Mono and Fira Sans.
No Fade in Split View 0.0.1 Disable fading of inactive window in split view.
C++/Objective-C Pack 1.0.0 Enhancements for Brackets when working with C, C++, Objective-C or Objective-C++ — Objective-C/C++ syntax highlighting, Ctrl-T (Quick Find Definition) for navigating a file, Ctrl-J (Jump to Definition) on #include jumps to included file, Ctrl-Shift-J anywhere toggles between header and main src file.
DS Tools 0.0.4 DS Specific tools for brackets
Dracula 1.0.0 Improved Dracula theme
Quick Insert 1.0.0 One key shortcut to insert text/tag/url
Geeko Water 0.1.0 Tema basado en la guía de estilo de Peter Gabriel’s Debut Album en TheDaysColor, con un toque Geeko.

Updated Extensions

Name Version Description Download
Indent Guides 1.3.3 Show indent guides in the code editor.
Column Ruler 2.3.9 An adjustable column ruler for Brackets.
Lines of Code Counter for JavaScript 1.2.0 Counts the number of JavaScript files, lines, and lines of code (“SLOC” - excluding whitespace/comments) in your project. Supports exclusions. To get started, choose “View > Count Lines of Code”.
Lint ALL the Things 1.1.1 Lint everything in your project in one batch! Optionally filter out certain files or folders, and see all the rest in a consolidated report. To get started, choose “View > Lint Whole Project”.
VisibleTabs 0.0.3 Make tabs visible in CodeMirror
Extensions Toolbar Reposition 0.2.9 Move extension toolbar to bottom to enlarge editor window. Hide and manage extension icons.
Go-IDE 0.0.10 Go language IDE transformation for brackets (needs gocode)
Projects 0.1.6 Open your projects from handy modal dialog. Really helpful if you have a lot of projects.
Zurb Foundation 5 Basic Template 1.0.2 Adds Zurb Foundation 5 basic template to your page. Go to menu and select File -> New Zurb Foundation 5 Document.
Tabs - Custom Working 4.0.1 Adds toolbar it include buttons show/hide with tabs of active documents on the top of the editor.
Ionic Framework Code Hinting 0.3.0 Code hinting for the Ionic Framework
ToggleCase 0.1.2 Toggle the case of the current word
Stripper 0.1.0 A brackets theme focused on readabiity.
OnsenUI Framework Code Hinting 0.3.0 Code hinting for the OnsenUI Framework
Dramatic Error Highliting 1.0.0 Overrides theme error highliting for optimal visibility of errors.
entry.summary:
Welcome to This Week’s Brackets Extension Updates, Issue 15/10.

Added or updated

entry.title: Weekly Brackets Extension Update - 15/09
entry.content:
Welcome to This Week’s Brackets Extension Updates, Issue 15/09.

Added or updated @Brackets extensions in the week from 02/16/2015 to 02/23/2015.

Last week there were 8 new Extensions and 12 updates. This includes themes and other extensions.

Have a great week!

Meanwhile, you can find us on these social networks

  • Facebook
  • Google Plus
  • twitter

Share your thoughts and stories, ask questions and get in touch with the team.

As usual, you can download the latest Brackets release. Please let us know what you think.

Top 11 Extension Downloads of last week

Find an overview of extensions that moved up and down the list.

Rank # Name Downloads Previous Week
1 Brackets Git 7885 #2 ⇑
2 Code Folding 5047 #1 ⇓
3 Beautify 4388 ⇔
4 Emmet 3838 #5 ⇑
5 HTML Templates 3620 ☼
6 Documents Toolbar 3042 #8 ⇑
7 HTMLHint 2601 ☼
8 Brackets Outline List 2080 #4 ⇓
9 Neon 1863 ☼
10 Minimap 1853 ☼
11 Extensions Rating 1815 ☼

Top 11 Theme Downloads of last week

Find an overview of themes that moved up and down the list.

Rank # Name Downloads Previous Week
1 Monokai Dark Soda 2308 ⇔
2 Stripper 1470 ☼
3 Blumberry Theme 884 ☼
4 Visual Studio Dark 839 #5 ⇑
5 xcode theme (yosemite) Light 751 ☼
6 Monokai 706 ⇔
7 Brackets Nodejs Theme 700 ☼
8 Obsidian 2.0 305 ☼
9 Blackboard 305 #8 ⇓
10 Crystal Blue 284 ⇔
11 Atom Dark Theme 283 #9 ⇓

New Extensions

Name Version Description Download
Brackets Nodejs Theme 1.0.0 This theme is for Nodejs developers
Blumberry Theme 1.1.0 A lightweight Coda-inspired theme for Brackets.io.
Permanent Scrollbars 0.0.1 Makes the file list scrollbars always visible
Brackets Selections 1.0.0 Brackets Extension that adds Sublime Text style selections to Brackets
Jump to definition into Context Menu 1.0.0 Adds the menu item into the context menu of the editor to jump to definition.
PHPLinter for Brackets 1.0.1 This extension works using php -l command
Pixelarium Dark Theme 1.0.0 Un tema para Brackets oscuro y en español!
Fira in Brackets 1.0.0 A simple extension that changes the Brackets UI fonts to Fira Mono and Fira Sans.

Updated Extensions

Name Version Description Download
HTMLHint 1.2.1 Adds HTMLHint support to Brackets.
Autosave Files on Window Blur 1.0.5 Autosave all open files when switching applications, in the style of PHPStorm/WebStorm.
HTML Templates 1.3.2 Inserts HTML from a pre-made list of templates.
ZoomView for Brackets 1.0.3 ZoomView added a zoom indicator on the bottom left of the editor.
BracketstoIX 2.12.0 Lorem ipsum, Break Line, Recent Files.Change(Case, Quote, Slash, Tab, Encoding), Sort, (Un)Tag, Clipboard, Internet, (Minify, traceur, sass, compass), Text Replace, Extrators, JSLint Global, JsDoc. Text Transforms(Reverse, UpperCase, LowerCase, Capitalize, CamelCase, HtmlEncode, HtmlDecode, UrlEncode, Join, Split, Number, Trim Leading, Trim Trailing, Sort Ascending, Sort Descending, Remove Duplicates, Remove Empty Lines, Unix To Win, Win To Unix, Single Quote To Double, Double To Single Quote, Toggle Quote, Single Slash To Double, Double To Single Slash, rgb-hex, Markdown Trim Trailing, Function JSDoc, Tag, Untag, Numbering).Clipboard(Copy Filename, Copy Fullname, Regnize, ExtratortoIX, Html Report).ReplacetoIX(Replace including Words only, Selection only, Multiline, Regnize, History).Internet Search(Open Url, Web Search, Browse File).Compiler(scss, js6 [ECMAScript 6], compass)
Go-IDE 0.0.10 Go language IDE transformation for brackets (needs gocode)
AsciiDoc Preview 1.1.5 Live preview for AsciiDoc documents.
Swig syntax highlighter 0.0.2 Enables Swig highlighting in Brackets.
ESLint 0.15.0 Adds ESLint support to Brackets
Brackets Print Margin 0.1.2 Adds a print margin line to the editor to helpt you keep your lines of code below a certain length. Easy configuration in the status bar.
Better quotes for Brackets 1.0.2 Make quotes work more like they do in Sublime. If text is selected and ‘ is pressed the selection will be wrapped in quotes
Obsidian 2.0 1.0.1 Theme based on Obsidian for Seam and change highlight colours
entry.summary:
Welcome to This Week’s Brackets Extension Updates, Issue 15/09.

Added or updated

entry.title: Weekly Brackets Extension Update - 15/08
entry.content:
Welcome to This Week’s Brackets Extension Updates, Issue 15/08.

Added or updated @Brackets extensions in the week from 02/09/2015 to 02/16/2015.

Last week there were 3 new Extensions and 20 updates. This includes themes and other extensions.

What’s going on?

I’m a bit late this time. Too much things going pon at the same time. :-)
We are in the final stages before the Brackets 1.3 release. Some final touches and some polish before we can call it ready. So plase stay tuned and get slowly into excitement about the new release. As usual, we’d like to hear your feedback.

Have a great week!

In the meantime, you can find us on these social networks

  • Facebook
  • Google Plus
  • twitter

Share your thoughts and stories, ask questions and get in touch with the team.

As usual, you can download the latest Brackets release. Please let us know what you think.

Top 11 Extension Downloads of last week

Find an overview of extensions that moved up and down the list.

Rank # Name Downloads Previous Week
1 Code Folding 4928 ⇔
2 Brackets Git 4303 ☼
3 Beautify 4121 #2 ⇓
4 Brackets Outline List 3633 #9 ⇑
5 Emmet 3557 #3 ⇓
6 colorHints 2184 ☼
7 JSHint 2088 #8 ⇑
8 Documents Toolbar 2052 #5 ⇓
9 Brackets Snippets (by zaggino) 1555 ☼
10 Markdown Preview 1516 ☼
11 Brackets File Icons 1478 #6 ⇓

Top 11 Theme Downloads of last week

Find an overview of themes that moved up and down the list.

Rank # Name Downloads Previous Week
1 Monokai Dark Soda 2572 #6 ⇑
2 Neon 1599 #1 ⇓
3 Stripper 1447 ☼
4 xcode theme (yosemite) Light 998 ☼
5 Visual Studio Dark 985 ☼
6 Monokai 644 #3 ⇓
7 Subtle Colors 307 #4 ⇓
8 Blackboard 296 #5 ⇓
9 Atom Dark Theme 291 #7 ⇓
10 Crystal Blue 254 #8 ⇓
11 Cobalt 244 #9 ⇓

New Extensions

Name Version Description Download
PHP SmartHints 1.1.4 Provides code hints for PHP files including PHP keywords, built-in functions, constants and variables. Also provides hinting for variables in the current open PHP document.
Go Programming Language syntax highlighter 0.0.1 Brings support for Go Programming Language from CodeMirror to Brackets.
Enhanced Scrollbars 1.0.0 Elegant scrollbars for the brackets editor

Updated Extensions

Name Version Description Download
Code Folding 0.3.1 Brackets extension that provides simple code folding for files edited in brackets. Supports brace folding, tag folding, indent folding and multi-line comment folding
Lint ALL the Things 1.1.0 Lint everything in your project in one batch! Optionally filter out certain files or folders, and see all the rest in a consolidated report. To get started, choose “View > Lint Whole Project”.
Brackets Bower 0.2.1 Manage your application’s front-end dependencies using Bower. You can install and prune dependencies using the bower.json file and configure Bower throubh .bowerrc. Also, quickly install front-end packages by hitting Ctrl/Cmd-Alt-B, then start typing the name of a package. Once you see the package you want, hit Enter and the package will be installed into your project folder. NOTE: To install some packages, you must have git installed.
colorHints 1.1.1 Show colors you used in your CSS file before as code hints.
Extensions Rating 0.6.1 Shows extension’s downloads count(daily, overall, average and per version) and GitHub stats(stars and forks). Find most usable and popular extensions for Brackets via badges system! Sort extensions and find themes!
Monokai Dark Soda 1.0.4 This dark theme is based on the monokai dark soda color scheme from Sublime Text.
Brackets ESLint 0.3.0 Integration of ESLint into Brackets
spell-check 0.5.8 Spell checking the Adobe Brackets Web Editor.
Vimderbar 0.7.2 Adds vim-like functionality & status bar to Brackets.
Brackets Snippets (by zaggino) 0.6.1 Snippets extension for Brackets
Visual Studio Dark 1.1.2 Visual Studio Dark theme for Brackets. Has language specific syntax colouring by using addModeClass=true.
Brackets Outline List 0.5.1 Displays a list of the functions or definitions in the currently opened document. Works with JavaScript, CoffeeScript, CSS, SCSS, LESS, XML, HTML, SVG, Markdown and PHP. Now with Icons!
xcode theme (yosemite) Light 5.1.0 An Brackets theme for a more native experience on OS X Yosemite. to maximize the topic, see (https://github.com/DH3ALEJANDRO/xcodeTheme-for-brackets#user-content-add-preferences)
Brackets Codeintel 0.1.1 Brackets Extension to navigate to classes and methods in any PHP file
cuwire: IDE for microcontrollers 0.5.2 Now Brackets can be used to develop software for MCUs. Throw away you Arduino, Energia and others.
Brackets Snippets (by edc) 1.5.0 Imitate Sublime Text’s behavior of snippets, and bring it to Brackets.
Indent softwrapped lines 0.2.5 When a line does not fit in editing area, it is softwrapped. This extension makes it so the wrapped part (2nd and subsequent lines) has the same indentation as the 1st line
Zotero Integration 0.1.5 Add In-Text Citations and Manage Bibliographies in Scholarly Markdown using Zotero
ToggleCase 0.1.1 Toggle the case of the current word
File Tree Exclude 0.4.5 Excludes folders from the Brackets file system to avoid the 30,000 file limit. This is an updated version of Glenn Ruehle’s now defunkt plugin.
entry.summary:
Welcome to This Week’s Brackets Extension Updates, Issue 15/08.

Added or updated

entry.title: Weekly Brackets Extension Update - 15/07
entry.content:
Welcome to This Week’s Brackets Extension Updates, Issue 15/07.

Added or updated @Brackets extensions in the week from 02/02/2015 to 02/09/2015.

Last week there were 2 new Extensions and 27 updates. This includes themes and other extensions.

What’s going on?

We are still working on the the upcoming Brackets 1.2 release. There are still a couple of PR’s under review and a couple of issues needs to be resolved. Stay tuned!

Have a great week!

In the meantime, you can find us on these social networks

  • Facebook
  • Google Plus
  • twitter

Share your thoughts and stories, ask questions and get in touch with the team.

As usual, you can download the latest Brackets release. Please let us know what you think.

Top 11 Extension Downloads of last week

Find an overview of extensions that moved up and down the list.

Rank # Name Downloads Previous Week
1 Code Folding 7549 #6 ⇑
2 Beautify 5854 #1 ⇓
3 Emmet 4503 #2 ⇓
4 HTML Templates 2613 ☼
5 Documents Toolbar 2486 ⇔
6 Brackets File Icons 2460 ☼
7 Autoprefixer 2365 ⇔
8 JSHint 2048 ☼
9 Brackets Outline List 1704 #3 ⇓
10 Brackets Tools 1436 #4 ⇓
11 Brackets Snippets (by edc) 1430 ☼

Top 11 Theme Downloads of last week

Find an overview of themes that moved up and down the list.

Rank # Name Downloads Previous Week
1 Neon 1820 ⇔
2 xcode theme (yosemite) 1410 ⇔
3 Monokai 1126 ⇔
4 Subtle Colors 657 ⇔
5 Blackboard 459 ⇔
6 Monokai Dark Soda 431 #9 ⇑
7 Atom Dark Theme 413 #8 ⇑
8 Crystal Blue 388 #7 ⇓
9 Cobalt 356 #10 ⇓
10 Ceratrior 339 #6 ⇓
11 Funkemedia Dark Theme 322 ⇔

New Extensions

Name Version Description Download
Brackets LinqSharp (by karthik25) 0.1.0 LinqSharp extension for Brackets
Sidebar Reloaded 1.0.0 Sidebar Reloaded

Updated Extensions

Name Version Description Download
Markdown Preview 1.0.10 Live preview of markdown documents
JSHint 2.2.10 Adds JSHint support to Brackets.
Code Folding 0.3.0 Brackets extension that provides simple code folding for files edited in brackets. Supports brace folding, tag folding, indent folding and multi-line comment folding
HTML Templates 1.3.0 Inserts HTML from a pre-made list of templates.
Brackets Bower 0.2.0 Manage your application’s front-end dependencies using Bower. You can install and prune dependencies using the bower.json file and configure Bower throubh .bowerrc. Also, quickly install front-end packages by hitting Ctrl/Cmd-Alt-B, then start typing the name of a package. Once you see the package you want, hit Enter and the package will be installed into your project folder. NOTE: To install some packages, you must have git installed.
Robot framework mode 1.1.3 Editing mode for Robotframework pipe-delimited plain text files, providing syntax highlighting, code folding, auto-completion (requires robotframework-hub - https://github.com/boakley/robotframework-hub) and more.
Extensions Toolbar Reposition 0.2.8 Move extension toolbar to bottom, enlarge editor window, hide and manage extension icons.
Brackets File Icons 1.3.1 File icons in Brackets’ file tree.
CDN Finder 0.1.1 Search for javascript libraries, jQuery plugins, fonts, CSS frameworks and anything else you might need. You can submit own library.
AsciiDoc Preview 1.1.3 Live preview for AsciiDoc documents.
BluePrint Beta 0.9.2 Code minimap and hierarchic outline viewer for JavaScript, HTML, CSS, LESS, SCSS, PHP and python.
Vimderbar 0.7.1 Adds vim-like functionality & status bar to Brackets.
LESSHints 1.1.0 Autocompletion for LESS variables.
SASSHints 1.1.0 Autocompletion for SASS/SCSS variables.
Doxygen 2.0.0 This extension offers to programmers an easy way to include doxygen comments in their codes.
Magento Hint 1.0.7 Ideal for developing Magento themes, get hints of the main functions, classes and methods.
Neon 1.1.1 Neon theme for Brackets.
Simple To-Do 0.1.3 Simple to-do list for Brackets. Tasks stored in human readable/editable text files.
Semicenter 0.1.7 ALT+ENTER - > Puts semicolon at current line, creates and indents new line below. ALT+SEMICOLON - > Puts semicolon at current line, goes to the end of current line. Simple, useful.
Ionic Framework Code Hinting 0.2.0 Code hinting for the Ionic Framework
Phaser Chains 1.0.2 A great new way to search the Phaser Documentation (Open View > Phaser Chains)
zeusCodeHinter 0.1.1 Useful for only Zeus Systems Pvt Ltd. Reads loc acc file of the interactivity folder.
CoffeeScript 1.0.3 Improves syntax highlighting for CoffeeScript.
Cursor Options 0.0.3 Change cursor display style (block, vertical, horizontal), color, and blink rate
Widget Development Plugin for Adobe Brackets 1.0.2 This extension turns Adobe Brackets into an IDE for creating Custom Widgets for the Mendix platform.
Brackets UI Custom CSS 0.1.1 apply custom css to brackets ui
Fading Cursor Blink 1.0.2 Fading Cursor Blink

Welcome to This Week’s Brackets Extension Updates, Issue 15/07.

entry.title: Weekly Brackets Extension Update - 15/06
entry.content:
Welcome to This Week’s Brackets Extension Updates, Issue 15/06.

Added or updated @Brackets extensions in the week from 01/26/2015 to 02/02/2015.

Last week there were 3 new Extensions and 17 updates. This includes themes and other extensions.

We are currently getting ready to release Brackets 1.2 in the upcoming weeks. If you need something fixed for this release, then this is a good time to contribute. Bugfixes, translations and documentation. We welcome every kind of contribution.

Have a great week!

In the meantime, you can find us on these social networks

  • Facebook
  • Google Plus
  • twitter

Share your thoughts and stories, ask questions and get in touch with the team.

entry.title: Weekly Brackets Extension Update - 15/05
entry.content:
Welcome to This Week’s Brackets Extension Updates, Issue 15/05.

Added or updated @Brackets extensions in the week from 01/19/2015 to 01/26/2015.

Last week there were 12 new Extensions and 19 updates. This includes themes and other extensions.

Much more contributions this week. This is great to see that everybody got more active in the new year. Keep up with your great contributions. This will make Brackets the #1 choice for web-designer and web-developer.

Have a great week!

In the meantime, you can find us on these social networks

  • Facebook
  • Google Plus
  • twitter

Share your thoughts and stories, ask questions and get in touch with the team.

New Extensions

Name Version Description Download
Oneliner 0.1.0 Remove all the line breaks and convert multilined text blocks into one line.
Graphite in Neon 1.0.0 A semi-dark theme that’s colourful and helpful.
FunctionFinder 1.0.0 Quickly find the function under your cursor. An extension that mirrors the Eclipse ‘Open Declaration’ functionality.
Funkemedia Dark Theme 1.0.0 A Dark Theme based on an inverted version of Dreamweavers light standard theme. Great if you are used to dreamweavers colours but a lot easier on the eye.
Double-click Brackets Selection 1.0.0 Brackets extension to select the block inside matching brackets by double clicking a bracket
Ionic Framework Code Hinting 0.1.0 Code hinting for the Ionic Framework
PhoneGap/Cordova Geliştiricileri Türkiye Topluluğu 1.0.0 PhoneGap/Cordova Geliştiricileri Türkiye Topluluğu Google Plus Sayfası Kısayolu.
Hannah 1.0.0 A purple background, with added green, white, gold, and light blue colors.
Set Line Endings for files 1.0.1 Set line endings based on .gitattributes
Subtle Colors 1.0.0 A subtle color theme
Ceratrior 1.0.0 Ceratrior theme for Brackets.
Brackets Snippets (by edc) 1.0.0 Imitate Sublime Text’s behavior of snippets, and bring it to Brackets.

Updated Extensions

Name Version Description Download
CSSLint 2.0.16 Adds CSSLint support to Brackets.
Beautify 1.1.6 Format JavaScript, HTML, and CSS files
Themes 2.0.5 CodeMirror and custom themes in Brackets
Ternific 0.7.3 JavaScript hinting and refactoring powered by Tern
Select Lines 1.3.0 Options for selecting lines via clicking/dragging in the gutter.
Brackets SASS 1.0.4-83 Compiles SASS .sass/.scss files when changed. Updates styles during Live Preview. Experimental support for Quick Edit.
JSCS 0.2.0 Adds JSCS support to Brackets. JSCS is a code style checker. JSCS can check cases, which are not implemeted in JSHint, but it does not duplicate JSHint functionality, so you should use JSCS and JSHint together.
BracketstoIX 2.10.0 Lorem ipsum, Break Line, Recent Files.Change(Case, Quote, Slash, Tab, Encoding), Sort, (Un)Tag, Clipboard, Internet, (Minify, traceur, sass, compass), Text Replace, Extrators, JSLint Global, JsDoc. Text Transforms(Reverse, UpperCase, LowerCase, Capitalize, CamelCase, HtmlEncode, HtmlDecode, UrlEncode, Join, Split, Number, Trim Leading, Trim Trailing, Sort Ascending, Sort Descending, Remove Duplicates, Remove Empty Lines, Unix To Win, Win To Unix, Single Quote To Double, Double To Single Quote, Toggle Quote, Single Slash To Double, Double To Single Slash, rgb-hex, Markdown Trim Trailing, Function JSDoc, Tag, Untag, Numbering).Clipboard(Copy Filename, Copy Fullname, Regnize, ExtratortoIX, Html Report).ReplacetoIX(Replace including Words only, Selection only, Multiline, Regnize, History).Internet Search(Open Url, Web Search, Browse File).Compiler(scss, js6 [ECMAScript 6], compass)
Brackets Tools 0.1.6 Brackets developer tools extension
LESS StyleSheets Formatter (nm|tU) 1.2.2 This formats LESS stylesheets to the format dictated by the Web Team Leader at nm|tU - a balance between a condensed format and readability
Documents Toolbar 0.5.6 Adds toolbar with tabs of open documents on the top of the editor. Now with split view support!
JSHint Configurator 1.1.1 Enables configuration of JSHint options. Reads from current document’s inline configuration directive or from ‘.jshintrc’ configuration file. Extract JSHint options to JSON format.
Brackets Outline List 0.4.5 Displays a list of the functions or definitions in the currently opened document. Works with JavaScript, CoffeeScript, CSS, SCSS, LESS, XML, HTML, SVG, Markdown and PHP. Now with Icons!
Open In Browser 2.5.0 Open the contents of your current view/tab in a web browser.
Simple To-Do 0.1.1 Simple to-do list for Brackets. Tasks stored in human readable/editable text files.
Resizable Bottom Working Files 1.0.1 Brackets extension to reposition Working Files in sidebar and make it resizable. (Toggle it in View Menu)
Tabs - Custom Working 2.5.0 Adds toolbar it include buttons show/hide with tabs of active documents on the top of the editor.
Cobalt 1.0.6 A dark blue theme based on Cobalt for Sublime.
Blackboard 1.0.2 A dark grey, green, blue, orange, yellow, and white theme based on Blackboard for Sublime
